general_info.summary: This text is a set of instructions and agreements for a user signing up for a program. It emphasizes the importance of accurate basic information, as it cannot be changed later. The user agrees to receive updates and notifications on their contact number and accepts the privacy policy. It also provides an option to log in if an account already exists.
general_info.raw_content:
NOTE: Please fill all your basic information carefullly as you can not change/update this information later.
I would like to receive updates, reminders and notifications on my contact number.
I accept the terms of privacy policy and would like to receive further updates about programme.
Already have an account? Login
